name: initialize_subscription
attributes: # [doc = " サブスクリプション開始：初期プランを設定し、有効化＋タイムスタンプ登録"]
body: let sub = & mut ctx . accounts . subscription ;
sub . owner = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
sub . bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("subscription") . unwrap () ;
sub . plan = initial_plan ;
let now = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
sub . start_ts = now ;
sub . last_payment_ts = now ;
sub . active = true ;

name: change_plan
attributes: # [doc = " プラン変更：新プランを設定し、最終支払時刻を更新"]
body: let sub = & mut ctx . accounts . subscription ;
sub . plan = new_plan ;
sub . last_payment_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: renew_subscription
attributes: # [doc = " 更新支払：最終支払時刻のみを更新（自動延長などに利用）"]
body: let sub = & mut ctx . accounts . subscription ;
sub . last_payment_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: cancel_subscription
attributes: # [doc = " サブスクリプション取消：アクティブフラグを下げ、時刻を更新"]
body: let sub = & mut ctx . accounts . subscription ;
sub . active = false ;
sub . last_payment_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: subscription
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ゼロクリア後、必要フィールドだけ設定"] # [account (init_zeroed , payer = user , seeds = [b"subscription" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 1 + 8 + 8 + 1)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " サブスクリプション利用者（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: subscription
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Subscription（PDA検証 + オーナーチェック）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"subscription" , owner . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = subscription . bump , has_one = owner)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 認証されたサブスク所有者（署名必須）"] # [account (signer)]
